main event: Airman Russell R. Newman observed a bright light changing colors, moving over the horizon at Forbes AFB, Kansas on January 2, 1963.
interesting points: The object changed color from orange to green to white,Witnesses described the object as a burning fireball descending at high speed,The object was estimated to be 2 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted approximately 4.5 seconds,The object disappeared over the eastern horizon.
witness description: Airman Russell R. Newman from the 51st Combat Defense Squadron
